name: tka-web-app-root
description: The Kinetic Constructor Web App - Root workspace manager

scripts.build: npm run build:legacy && npm run build:modern
scripts.test: npm run test:legacy && npm run test:modern
scripts.lint: npm run lint:legacy && npm run lint:modern
scripts.format: npm run format:legacy && npm run format:modern
scripts.install:all: npm run install:legacy && npm run install:modern
scripts.clean: npm run clean:legacy && npm run clean:modern
scripts.status: echo 'TKA Web App Status:' && echo 'Legacy Web: http://localhost:5175' && echo 'Modern Web: http://localhost:5174' && echo 'Use npm run dev:legacy or npm run dev:modern to start'

author: TKA Team
